code_events.event:
Fired when setup quill editor options.

Callback signature:

array &$options, string $context

Arguments:

  1. array &$options - The editor options.
  2. string $context - Context in which editor is handled.

Allows to chat commands

Callback signature:

array &$commands

Arguments:

  1. array &$commands - commands array in format [['command_name' => 'handler_class'], ...]

Allows to chat message types

Callback signature:

array &$types

Arguments:

  1. array &$types - types array in format [['type_name' => 'handler_class'], ...]
